newsitem.title: USA: Management Tech files suit against ex-pres.
newsitem.headline: Management Tech files suit against ex-pres.

text.p: Management Technologies Inc said on Thursday that it had filed suit in the Supreme Court of the state of New York against its former president, Peter Morris, seeking to declare a $310,000 convertible debenture held by Morris as void.
The company also said it had filed suit against 16 individual and corporate defendants, alleging they bought convertible debentures issued by the company to manipulate the price of its stock.
The second suit, filed in the Southern District Court of New York, seeks to block the defendants from converting their debentures into common stock below market price.
Management Technologies said it was seeking damages in the case, but did not disclose a dollar amount.
Management Technologies develops software for international financial institutions.
